Catalyst has several custom map edits, two of which are our **toxic Research Facilities.**
- **Both** Underground Facilities are covered in **toxic clouds.**
One Research Facility is located at `Balota Airstrip` and the other at `Stary Yar`, both can be located on the map.

The Military Research Facilities are covered in `toxic fumes`, this is caused by the lack of maintenance and protection to what was once a government runned operation to make new chemical weapons. There is now a permanent cloud of toxic gas that seeps from the underground bunkers and covers the facilities.
To survive the area you will need a `gas mask` that can `attach filters` onto it. It is recommended you have at least `more than one` on you to not die by the toxic fumes.
Stary Yar Research Facility has two doors, both of which lead to separate underground bunkers.

`Tier 5 loot` spawns in these locations, it is `never a guarantee` to be filled with tier 5 loot, especially if a player has looted it quite recently before you. Be sure to keep a sharp eye out for loot that can easily `blend into the surroundings.`
